title: Drawing, 1969-165-289, 1959
signed: In graphite, lower right below design: ALEXANDER GIRARD 2/4/59
inscribed: In graphite, upper margin: HALF FULL SIZE REPEAT / 24"; in graphite, at left below design: NOTE: / "SEEDS" ARE TO BE COLOR PRINTED / SERIES 715 "PUMPKIN SEEDS"; Verso: in graphite, upper left corner: XII-3
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
description: Grid pattern of three rows of alternating oval shapes
